title: TriStar L-1011 Flight Simulator Expansion Pack - PC
features: Four TriStar variants included: L-1011-500 civilian airliner, RAF C2 (passenger), RAF K1 (passenger/air-to-air tanker) and RAF KC1 (cargo/air-to-air tanker)
Accurate virtual cockpit featuring INS, autopilot, radio suite and functional annunciators â€“ 2D panel with numerous pop-ups also available
Precisely detailed external models with animated flying surfaces, landing gear, airbrakes, engine cowlings and doors
Accurately modelled and animated hose-and-drogue in-flight refuelling system on the K1 and KC1 tanker variants with refuelling controls on the Engineer's panel
description: Financial setbacks and development problems with its Rolls Royce RB211 engines meant that it lost out to the rival DC 10 in commercial sales, but the TriStar was a technologically advanced aircraft that remains an aviation icon. This new Just Flight L 1011 TriStar collection pays homage to this much loved tri jet with four superbly modelled airliner and military variants in a total of 25 paint schemes. The aircraft feature accurately detailed 2D panels and virtual cockpits complete with refuelling controls on the tanker variants, a fully functioning Inertial Navigation System, stunning high resolution textures and an authentic flight model with the TriStar's unique Direct Lift Control runway approach system.
